column5: I had a question to ask you folks, but I thought I better start off with a post  We have been hitting LOTW near Kenora the past couple of weekends fishing for crappies. The bite has been slow compared to last year. We are still managing some nice slabs. Just click on  pictures to see bigger pic.    Now to my question, when is the best time for crappies at Nestor Falls? I was planning on trying around Xmas time.  thx , Cory
I can't offer any help up that way with the fishing but welcome aboard.  Mike
Have no idea,but real nice crappie you got there  ,and welcome.
Welcome, welcome! This is a great board and the place to be looking for fishing info!
Welcome aboard, Nice crappie W2G. don't know about yur question?????    jordan
Welcome aboard................and you've already figured out that we like pics!!
Welcome aboard.  Now if I only knew where Nestor Falls was  Joey
Never fished LOTW, or wherever Nestor Falls is. but welcome to the board.
Welcome! I'm jealous, you live in an awesome area!
Hello all..Another newbie here...Just got this all figured out and its way past my bedtime.....See you all tomorrow night
Thx for the welcomes. Is there no one here from Northwestern Ontario?
I don't think computers have made their way to NW Ontario yet...   joking.  Generally, last ice is one of the best times for crappie on any body of water during winter.
